mods:mods.mods:note: Looking bewildered but content this Vietnamese child spends his time munching on a cookie. The relocation center has a child day care center which teaches the children of the area how to speak English, count, and generally discover what America is all about
mods:mods.mods:accessCondition: Material in public domain. No restrictions on use
